Trade/Device Name(s): BD Veritor System for Rapid Detection of Flu A + B CLIA waived Kit
BD Veritor System Flu A + B
Submitter Information: BD Diagnostic Systems, Point of Care
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Veritor System for Rapid Detection of Flu A + B CLIA waived kit, an immunochromatographic assay for influenza A/B antigen detection.
Indications for Use Summary: Aid in diagnosis of influenza A and B viral infections by qualitative detection of their nucleoprotein antigens from nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs of symptomatic patients; negative tests are presumptive and not intended to detect influenza C antigens.
